text: 3.5 Jon 3.3-5, Lom 11.6, Epe 5.26, 2 Ti 1.9, 1 Pi 3.21 God chɨnop tɨg asɨk dup. Chɨn gɨtep yɨbɨl gon nɨŋɨd, chɨnop tɨg asɨk ma dup. Ne ke pen chɨnop mapen nɨgup tek tɨg asɨk dup. Won anɨb ak kɨlop tɨg asɨk din agɨl, gach chɨnop ak wik yokɨl, Kawnan ne ak chɨnop agyokek apɨl chɨnop gek, ñapay ne yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, koŋɨm nep mɨdobun.
